alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 04 at 10:43PM CDT until September 05 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Bibb, Jefferson and Shelby. * WHEN...Until 100 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1043 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Bessemer, Pelham, Helena, Centreville, Indian Springs Village, Lake View, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, North Bibb, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Ashby, Hoover Metropolitan Stadium, Ross Bridge, Riverchase, Bluff Park, Patton Creek and Riverchase Galleria.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
